title: Please fix Malzahar's ultimate.
body: When I ult someone I expect them to be suppressed and still not be able to attack me, kthx.

replies.body:
who did you ult lol? coz if i know im gonna be vsing a malz i get qss as a 2nd or 3rd item
check their build before you ult them.
Did they have a quicksilver sash? be olaf? or have the spell cleanse? by any chance
If u mean ignite or a DOT then uninstall plz...
